sentences: Poleks sa mind aidanud, oleksin praegu veel põlenud.
Ta on tuletõrjeürituse käigul õppinud, kuidas tulekahju ära põletada.
context: The Estonian word 'põlema' is a verb that means 'to burn' or 'to be burning.' It can describe something that is currently on fire (like Tuli põleb majas - The fire is burning in the house) or it can indicate having been burned due to lack of help (Poleks sa mind aidanud, oleksin praegu veel põlenud). In some contexts, it may also mean 'to set fire to' or 'to burn down.'
